sqlMap.select: SELECT ACTIVITY_ID AS ACTIVITYID, ACTIVITY_NAME AS ACTIVITYNAME, ACTIVITY_DESC AS ACTIVITYDESC, FLOW_ID AS FLOWID, ACTIVITY_TYPE AS ACTIVITYTYPE, ACTIVITY_ORDER AS ACTIVITYORDER, ACTIVITY_ROLE AS ACTIVITYROLE, ACTIVITY_SFXDDW AS ACTIVITYSFXDDW FROM W_ACTIVITY T WHERE T.FLOW_ID = #value#
SELECT T.END_ACTIVITY FROM W_LINE T WHERE T.START_ACTIVITY = #value#
SELECT I.INSTANCE_ID,T.LINE_ID FROM W_LINE T, W_INSTANCE I WHERE T.END_ACTIVITY = I.ACTIVITY_ID AND T.START_ACTIVITY = #value#

SELECT CONNECT_ID AS CONNECTID, CONNECT_NAME AS CONNECTNAME, CONNECT_VALUE AS CONNECTVALUE, START_INSTANCE AS STARTINSTANCE, END_INSTANCE AS ENDINSTANCE, LINE_ID AS LINEID, PENDING_PERSON AS PENDINGPERSON, CREATE_TIME AS CREATETIME FROM W_CONNECT T WHERE T.START_INSTANCE = #startInstanceId# AND T.PENDING_PERSON = #userId# AND ROWNUM =1

SELECT T.ACTIVITY_ID AS ACTIVITYID, T.ACTIVITY_NAME AS ACTIVITYNAME, T.ACTIVITY_DESC AS ACTIVITYDESC, T.FLOW_ID AS FLOWID, T.ACTIVITY_TYPE AS ACTIVITYTYPE, T.ACTIVITY_ORDER AS ACTIVITYORDER, T.ACTIVITY_ROLE AS ACTIVITYROLE, T.ACTIVITY_SFXDDW AS ACTIVITYSFXDDW FROM W_ACTIVITY T, W_INSTANCE W WHERE T.ACTIVITY_ID = W.ACTIVITY_ID AND W.INSTANCE_ID = #value#
SELECT T.INSTANCE_ID,L.LINE_ID FROM W_INSTANCE T, W_LINE L WHERE T.ACTIVITY_ID = L.END_ACTIVITY AND L.START_ACTIVITY = #startActivityId# AND L.LINE_VAR_VALUE = #varValue#

SELECT T.* FROM w_workflow T WHERE 1=1
t.flow_name like '%'||#flowName#||'%'
ORDER BY T.flow_name

SELECT COUNT(*) CN FROM w_workflow T WHERE 1=1
t.flow_name like '%'||#flowName#||'%'

select activity_id as activityId,activity_name as activityName,activity_desc as activityDesc,flow_id as flowId,activity_type as activityType,activity_order as activityOrder,activity_role as activityRole,activity_sfxddw as activitySfxddw from w_activity where flow_id=#value# order by activity_name

select line_id as lineId,line_name as lineName,line_var_value as lineVarValue,start_activity as startActivity,end_activity as endActivity,counter_type as counterType,counter_value as counterValue from w_line where flow_id=#value# order by line_name

select activity_id as activityId,activity_name as activityName,activity_desc as activityDesc,flow_id as flowId,activity_type as activityType,activity_order as activityOrder,activity_role as activityRole,activity_sfxddw as activitySfxddw from w_activity t where t.flow_id = #flowId# and t.activity_type = '1'

select line_id as lineId,line_name as lineName,line_var_value as lineVarValue,start_activity as startActivity,end_activity as endActivity,counter_type as counterType,counter_value as counterValue,flow_id as flowId from w_line t where t.start_activity = #value# and rownum = 1

select line_id as lineId,line_name as lineName,line_var_value as lineVarValue,start_activity as startActivity,end_activity as endActivity,counter_type as counterType,counter_value as counterValue from w_line t where t.start_activity = #startActivityId# and t.line_var_value = #varValue# and rownum = 1
select * from C_ROLE t order by t.role_order
select t.activity_id from W_ACTIVITY t where t.activity_name = #value#
select t.flow_id from w_workflow t where t.flow_name = #value# and rownum = 1
select t.flow_file from W_DEFINITION t,w_workflow w where t.flow_id = w.flow_id and w.flow_name = #value# and rownum = 1

select a.activity_role from W_CONNECT t, w_instance w, w_activity a, w_line l where t.end_instance = w.instance_id and t.connect_id = #connectId# and l.start_activity = w.activity_id and l.line_var_value = #varValue# and l.end_activity = a.activity_id and rownum = 1
select c.user_id,c.user_name,c.real_name from C_USERROLE t,c_user c,c_role r where t.user_id = c.user_id and t.role_id = r.role_id and r.role_name= #value#
SELECT C.USER_ID,C.USER_NAME,C.REAL_NAME FROM C_USERROLE T,C_USER C,C_ROLE R WHERE T.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND T.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID and c.orgna_id = #orgnaId# and r.role_name=#roleName#
